name: Advocate G.S. Parashar
bio: Advocate G.S. Parashar is a dedicated litigator practicing in Delhi and across India, specializing in criminal and matrimonial cases.

name: Advocate Priyanka S. Aneja
bio: With seven years in office work and five years in law, Advocate Priyanka Aneja practices in the Supreme Court, Delhi High Court, and various tribunals.

name: Advocate Menka Gupta
bio: Practicing in the Punjab and Haryana High Court, Advocate Menka Gupta specializes in criminal and matrimonial cases.

name: Advocate Rohit Jain
bio: With a background in cyber security, Advocate Rohit Jain practices in the Indore High Court and District Court.

name: Advocate Rakhi Budhiraja
expertise: Income Tax Act and Related Services
bio: Advocate Rakhi Budhiraja has extensive experience practicing in the Supreme Court of India, Delhi High Court, and various district courts.

name: Advocate Kanchan Kumari
bio: Advocate Kanchan Kumari specializes in family law and practices in the Bombay High Court and subordinate courts.

name: Advocate Harpreet Singh Sachdeva
bio: With 25 years of experience, Advocate Harpreet Singh Sachdeva practices in the Delhi High Court and district courts.

name: Advocate Riya Gulati
bio: Advocate Riya Gulati practices across various courts, including district courts, commissions, tribunals, High Court, and Supreme Court.

name: Advocate Arihant Jain
bio: Advocate Arihant Jain practices in all district courts in Delhi NCR and consumer commissions.

name: Advocate Rashmi Parmar
bio: Practicing in the High Court and Cooperative Court, Advocate Rashmi Parmar specializes in testamentary matters and document drafting.

name: Advocate Darshan Modi
bio: With a decade of experience, Advocate Darshan Modi practices in various courts, including the Bombay City Civil and Sessions Court.

name: Advocate Pulkit Gulati
bio: Advocate Pulkit Gulati practices in the High Court and all Delhi district courts, handling both civil and criminal cases.

name: Advocate Rajesh K.S
bio: Advocate Rajesh K.S has 19 years of experience and practices in Subedar Chatram Road (SC Road), Bangalore.

name: Advocate Ricky Chopra
bio: Advocate Ricky Chopra has 24 years of experience and practices in Sector - 49, Gurgaon.

name: Advocate Wg Cdr Ajit Kakkar (Retd)
bio: Advocate Ajit Kakkar, a retired Wing Commander, has 25 years of legal experience and practices in Dwarka, Delhi.

name: Advocate Sunil Kumar Bakshi
bio: With 38 years of experience, Advocate Sunil Kumar Bakshi practices in Sector-16, Faridabad.

name: Advocate Rajesh Rai
bio: Advocate Rajesh Rai has 25 years of experience and practices in Sector-19, Dwarka, Delhi.

name: Advocate H Gouri Shankar
bio: Advocate H Gouri Shankar practices in Hyderabad, providing legal services in civil, criminal, and family law.

name: Advocate Ramesh Gupta
bio: Advocate Ramesh Gupta is renowned for handling high-profile criminal cases in Delhi.

name: Advocate Salman Khurshid
bio: Advocate Salman Khurshid is a prominent lawyer, author, and politician practicing in Delhi.

name: Advocate Sidharth Luthra
bio: Advocate Sidharth Luthra is a highly renowned criminal defense attorney in Delhi.

name: Advocate K.T.S. Tulsi
bio: Advocate K.T.S. Tulsi is a senior advocate and politician specializing in criminal law in Delhi.
